Mentoring Django as a part of Free Code Camp Hyderabad Month of Code Program

19 May 2017

Month of Code is a program initiated by Kapil Datta of Free Code Camp, Hyderabad. The program aims at mentoring a single/group of student on a programming stack that is considered useful by the industry and lands them into some job opportunity. The underlying sentiment is to improve to the state of development in Hyderabad as Kapil always says.

The program is Month of Code contains few programs that ranges from Data structures + Algorithms to HTML + CSS + Javascript.

I will be mentoring the Python + Django Program in Month of Code. More details of the program and requirements can be found on github/rrmerugu/FCC-Month-of-Code-Program

To apply for the program, submit your application from here https://fcc-hyd.github.io/month-of-code/#form
